casebody.data:
January 12, 1959.* No. 13,

Original.

New York v. New Jersey et al. Louis J. Lejkowitz, Attorney General, Paxton Blair, Solicitor General, and Ruth Kessler Toch, Assistant Solicitor General, for the State of New York, plaintiff. David D. Furman, Attorney General, and Charles J. Kehoe, Deputy Attorney General, for the State of New Jersey, and William S. Gaud for the American Express Co., defendants.

Mr. Justice FRANKFURTER took no part in the consideration or decision of cases in which orders were filed with the Clerk on this day and were not announced.

The motion for leave to file bill of complaint is denied.
